name: germline
publications: Gusev A, Lowe JK, Stoffel M, Daly MJ, Altshuler D, Breslow JL, Friedman JM, Pe'er I (2008) Whole population, genomewide mapping of hidden relatedness. Genome Research.
description: GERMLINE is an algorithm for discovering long shared segments of Identity by Descent (IBD) between pairs of individuals in a large population
